publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5408 Mr David Davidson: Custodial Sentences and Weapons (Scotland) Bill—That the Justice 2 Committee considers the Custodial Sentences and Weapons (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the following order: sections 43 to 46, section 1, schedule 1, sections 2 to 42, sections 47 to 49, schedule 2, section 50, schedule 3 and the long title.

S2M-5408 Mr David Davidson: Custodial Sentences and Weapons (Scotland) Bill—That the Justice 2 Committee considers the Custodial Sentences and Weapons (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the following order: sections 43 to 46, section 1, schedule 1, sections 2 to 42, sections 47 to 49, schedule 2, section 50, schedule 3 and the long title.
